text: Ara naridera madhye tomadera adhikarabhukta dasi [1] chara saba sadhaba tomadera jan'ya nisid'dha, tomadera jan'ya egulo allahara bidhana. Ullekhita narigana chara an'ya narike arthabyaye biye karate ca'oya tomadera jan'ya baidha kara hala, abaidha yauna samparkera jan'ya naya.
